function EP03_01_02()
    -- .序章-1【7月第1週】「初めての水着探し（ただし女物）」
    SaveData.Title = "初めての水着探し（ただし女物）"


    ----.//注釈：精神値LV.３以上の場合は以下の通り。

    -- 【指示説明】

    -- 　//BG：背景の指定
    -- 　//BU：バストアップの指定
    -- 　//SE：効果音の指定
    -- 　//CI：カットインの指定
    -- 　//effect：演出の希望
    -- 　◆：シーン切り替え

    -- 第３話「ボク姫様と姫のカゴ」

    -- 12345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890

    -- //BG：都会
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG008aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0613.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Thanks for coming shopping with me, Akira." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：アキラ・私服
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0542.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "There was a new volume of the manga I wanted, so the timing worked out perfectly." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0543.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Still, for Minachin to suddenly want to pick out a swimsuit for school—people really can change, huh?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0614.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Haha... Well, it’s something I can’t avoid. Swimming classes start soon, so I thought I’d pick a proper one." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0544.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It shows you’ve gotten comfortable enough to think ahead. I was going to pick the swimsuit myself, but I’m glad we could come together." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0545.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "In a town like this, there should be a swimsuit or two that can hide your gender. Let’s take our time looking." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017",1000,false)

    MSG([[ And so we wandered around Osu’s streets together, looking at various swimsuits. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG008aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0546.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Minachin, Minachin, isn’t this one cute?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0615.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Y-Yeah... I think it’s cute." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0547.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Geez... We’re not doing anything wrong by browsing women’s swimsuits, so pull yourself together." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0616.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I know that, though." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0548.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "If you’re that embarrassed, want to crossdress right now? I could even bring crossdressing gear with me." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0617.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Hehehe, I’m fine!! Totally fine!! Come on, let’s find a swimsuit quickly and then get some food!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It’d been a while since I’d come to this town without a disguise. Today, at least, I wanted to spend time without crossdressing. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0549.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "If you wear a swimsuit that digs into the butt, it might draw all the attention there and help hide your gender?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0618.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Rejected. It’s risky to attract so much attention, and more than that, it’s just plain embarrassing." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0550.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Such selfishness. Then how about this string swimsuit, a slingshot one—" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0619.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Were you even listening!? That swimsuit shows everything, not just the butt but the front and chest too!? Why are you trying to increase the exposure!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0551.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Don’t chicken out before trying. A certain good guy once said: Men have guts! You just have to try everything." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0620.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "It’s not about guts. It’s a matter of fabric coverage—I can’t hide anything!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I put back on the rack the swimsuits Akira eagerly pushed at me. ]])

    MSG([[ There, one swimsuit on the rack caught my eye. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0621.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ah, this swimsuit! It has fabric that goes down to about the knees. This might help hide my gender, don’t you think?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0552.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ah, a pareo." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02fb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0553.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "If it’s a short one, it’s okay, but that size of pareo isn’t suitable for swimming. It clings to your body in the water and gets in the way." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0554.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "No matter how free Yuriai Private Academy is with swimsuit arrangements, that’s definitely inappropriate." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0622.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-Is it really a swimsuit if it’s not suitable for swimming...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0555.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Surprisingly, many women’s swimsuits aren’t made for serious swimming. The popular tankinis lately have the same issue." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0556.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Maybe for the women who come to the beach or pool, swimming isn’t the main point." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0623.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Not swimming at the beach or pool... I just can’t understand that..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0557.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It means you still have a lot to learn about women, Minachin." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0558.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Today’s swimsuit shopping will be a good experience for you. Come on, let’s keep going <sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG008aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017",1000,false)

    MSG([[ After several hours of searching, we circled the town and returned to the first shop, where Akira pointed to a certain swimsuit and said. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0559.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Oh, Minachin, don’t you like that swimsuit?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0624.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ At the spot Akira pointed to was a blue swimsuit with a large area of fabric and a big flared skirt hanging on the rack. ]])

    MSG([[ I hadn’t noticed because I was distracted by more provocative swimsuits earlier, but this design is right up my alley. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0625.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Cute! The color and pattern are wonderful!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0560.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Heh, that’s clearly your best reaction so far." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0561.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "With this high waist, it can hide a lot, and the design is cute too. I’ll make a few adjustments and get it ready for you." ]])

    MSG([[ What surprised me the most was that Akira found a swimsuit perfectly suited to my taste among countless others. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though we came together, I ended up relying completely on Akira. ]])

    MSG([[ I was deeply grateful once again for my cousin who understands me better than anyone else. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ja")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0626.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Thank you, Akira. I’m always being helped by you; I really can’t repay you." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

STOP_BGM(1000)
PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0562.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "If you feel that way, let’s go to the fitting room. I think I know Minachin’s body size perfectly, but it doesn’t hurt to try it on just to be sure." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0627.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh!? B-But I’m not crossdressing right now!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0563.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s just measuring your size, so it’s fine even with your bare face. Except your mental state, that is." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0628.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "That mental state is exactly the problem~~~~..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I couldn’t show this to anyone but Akira... ]])

    MSG([[ In the end, that day I tried on swimsuits in my bare face. ]])

    MSG([[ And then, the first day of swimming class arrived―― ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP03_02")
end
